caption: IM PROUD OF EVERYTHING THEY HAVE ACCOMPLISHED AND I WILL SUPPORT THEM THROUGH EVERYTHING. they mean the absolute world to me. and I have never gotten to meet them and it would mean more than u can imagine to actually have the opportunity to meet two amazing boys. whenever I see their picture on my screen, their tweets, when I hear their music, I smile. they make me genuinely happy. I'm going through tough times and they've helped me know that I can do it, i can get through everything and I can always rely on them to put me out of a bad mood. it's incredible how two people whom I've never even met before can do such amazing things for me and make me feel like such a happier person, but they do. and all I want to do is be wrapped in their arms so I can tell them how much they mean to me and thank them for helping me become a happier person. I love them so much and I will always support them. I just want to know they love me too. they are so appreciative for all of the fans they have and are so humble too. I was going to try to meet them when they are coming to NYC but U have to be 16 or older and their show is on a school night and I don't think I can go to the airport cuz no one will drive me and plus it's like my first days of school so I can't skip:((( please chose me so I can finally meet them after all this time?? #contest
